attributes.action: Erect a Statue to Commemerate the last "casualty" of WW1 the "War to end all Wars."
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are 3 living survivors of WW1, the "War to end all Wars."  Would it not be fitting to erect a statue of some sort, to mark the passing of the end of this chapter of World history?
